data.text: @ShabirMadh @pieterstreicher @MRCza Where have you been?? Only now?... There never has been a need or justification... You just admitted it 😉

@Louwrens911 @ShabirMadh @pieterstreicher @MRCza Sheeples!! I think parents should band together and go to court. There must be some lawyers amongst fed-up parents who would be willing to do pro Bono work. Plenty of evidence of the uselessness and harm that masks do.

@Cousens19 @ShabirMadh @pieterstreicher @MRCza Well I am in a war of words with both my childrens schools.
They comply and enforce like brainless lemmings.

@Louwrens911 @ShabirMadh @pieterstreicher @MRCza Schools are scared of the police and the Government. Because it's supposed to be a crime not to wear a mask. Some parents are also so fearful of the so called " deadly virus". 🙄 Luckily some teachers appear to be less concerned these days about masks and tend not to enforce it.
@Cousens19 @ShabirMadh @pieterstreicher @MRCza Could parents just wake up and join hands and tell the schools to STOP.
@MRCza @barrybateman Yet @WitsUniversity engineering is still online only.  Why?
@MRCza @Rob_blogging Only after the 10000 pages released by Pfizer proves that the vaccine injuries are true & higher than they reported. Shame on u for lying to people about the vaccine!
@MRCza @FrancoisVenter3 Immunity was always the path out of the woods of the pandemic.  Just took longer than anyone wanted.  Vaccination accelerated that process and saved millions of lives.

@MRCza Suddenly
But worse things to come
